headline.main: At MoMA, Dream Designs. On Instagram, the Reality.

snippet: On Instagram, more than 18,500 posts, linked by #ArquiMoMA, are serving as a complement to the Museum of Modern Art’s “Latin America in Construction: Architecture 1955-1980” exhibition.
abstract: On Instagram, more than 18,500 posts, linked by #ArquiMoMA, are serving as a complement to the Museum of Modern Art’s “Latin America in Construction: Architecture 1955-1980” exhibition.
